attributes.action: ban the use of piercing guns for body piercing,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Piercing guns are an extremely unsafe way to pierce which unfortunately many people do not know.

They are unsterile and the studs used are too short to accomodate for any swelling and made of plated inadequate metal as well as being unsterile. 
The inability to sterilise guns between customer use increases the risk of spreading disease.

The choice between a teenager who has learnt to pierce with these guns from a half hour video before being set loose on the public (including children and even newborns) and a professional who uses one-use sterile needles and in a clean environment (not a dusty shop window) shouldn't be difficult.

Body piercing is becoming very commonplace, we should at least do some research into it and provide safe procedure and aftercare (something places like Claire's Accessories are not very good at) to ensure a reduction in embedded gun studs and infection.
